programme.title: פלואי גיבור קטן גדול (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מקסימה. גוזל צעיר אשר חושש ללמוד לעוף נותר מאחור כאשר משפחתו החלה נודדת דרומה בעונת הסתיו. כעת, בעזרתם של חברים טובים, עליו לנסות לצלוח את החורף הקר ולהתאחד שוב עם משפחתו האהובה. איסלנד, 2018. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: מועדון ווינX - במעמקי הים הקסום
programme.desc: הכל רגוע ושקט בבי"ס לפיות בו עובדות הפיות של מועדון ווינX. השלווה מופרת כשחבורת טריקס המרושעת מגיעה לאוקינוס האין-סופי, במטרה לכבוש את כס המלכות. דיבוב עברית: עדי זינו, מירב דמארי. במאי: איג'יניו סטראפי. 2014. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: הדרקון הראשון שלי 3: העולם הנסתר (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה, החלק המסיים את הטרילוגיה הקסומה מבית דרימוורקס ("שרק"). החיים בעיר הסודית של הויקינגים ודרקוניהם ניצבים בפני סכנה כאשר צייד דרקונים אימתני מגלה את מיקום העיר. דיבוב עב': ניב פטל. במאי: דין דבלואה. 2019. כ' עב'.\r\n.(n)

programme.title: טד החוקר החופר (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. טד, חוקר הארצות הנודע והמטורלל, יוצא למסע חילוץ מטורף של אהובתו מידיו של מיליונר מרושע. לניסיון החילוץ מצטרפים לטד חבריו בלזוני התוכי וכלבו הנאמו ג'ף. בימוי: דיויד אלונסו, אנריקה גאטו. ספרד, 2017. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: תעלול של טיול (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מהיוצרים של 'מדגסקר'. חסידת דואר מבולבל שולח בטעות גור פנדה לביתו של הדוב. כעת יוצא הדוב טוב הלב בליווי חברו הארנב למסע מרתק במטרה להשיב את הגור להוריו. דיבוב: אמנון וולף. במאי: וסילי רובנסקי. 2019. כ' עב'.\r\n.(n)

programme.title: הרפתקה מוטרפת במוזיאון (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. ילד חנון המכור למשחקי מחשב מוצא עצמו במוזיאון בובות נטוש ובטעות מפיח בהן רוח חיים. כעת עליו להוכיח את כישורי המשחק שלו, כדי לנסות להציל את העולם מבובה מרושעת. דיבוב:איתי סולומון. במאי:מרטין קוטיק. 2017. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: קרוקודיל לייל (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית לייב אקשן מוזיקלית. בבית חדש בניו יורק, נער מתקשה להתאקלם, כל זה משתנה כשהוא מגלה בעליית הגג את לייל - תנין מזמר שאוהב אמבטיות ומוזיקה טובה. דיבוב: לירון לב, אריאל לינזדן. במאים: ג'וש גורדון, וויל ספק. 2022. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: קסם של בית (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. חתלתול המחפש מחסה מסערה מגיע לבית מסתורי בו גר קוסם עם שלל חיות, רובוטים וטריקים. כשאחיינו של הקוסם רוצה למכור את הבית, מנסות החיות להפחידו. דיבוב עב': נדב ירושלמי, אלברט כהן. בימוי: ג'רמי דגרוסון, בן סטסן. 2013.(n)

programme.title: בובספוג: הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. בובספוג ופטריק יוצאים לעיר הצדפה כדי למצוא את הפושע האמיתי שגנב את הכתר ולשחרר את מר קראב ממאסר. דיבוב: עידו מוסרי, לירון ברנס, גלעד קלטר. במאי: סטפן הילנבורג. 2004. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: הדרקון הראשון שלי 3: העולם הנסתר
programme.desc: אנימציה, החלק המסיים את הטרילוגיה הקסומה מבית דרימוורקס ("שרק"). החיים המשותפים בעיר הסודית של הוויקינגים ודרקוניהם ניצבים בפני סכנה כאשר צייד דרקונים אימתני מגלה את מיקום העיר. דיבוב:ג'רארד באטלר. במאי:דין דבלואה. 2019.(n)

programme.title: הנסיך וסינדרלה (מדובב)
programme.desc: פנטזיית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה בדיבוב של אליאנה תדהר. סיפורה של סינדרלה, נערה יפת תואר וטובת לב, שאמה ואחותה החורגות מתייחסות אליה כמו למשרתת. חייה משתנים כשבאחד הטיולים שלה ביער היא פוגשת בנסיך הממלכה. עם: אסטריד אס. 2021.(n)

programme.title: Parachute
programme.desc: Riley, a young woman recently released from rehab, meets Ethan and finds herself navigating the line between love and a new addiction. Director Brittany Snow's romantic comedy drama, starring Courtney Eaton, Thomas Mann and Dave Bautista.(n)

programme.title: Miranda's Victim
programme.desc: Teenager Patricia 'Trish' Weir is committed to putting her kidnapper and rapist Ernesto Miranda in prison, while her life is wrecked by the legal system. Drama, starring Abigail Breslin, Emily VanCamp and Kyle MacLachlan.(n)

programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: Artie Crawford is a Second World War veteran who has just lost his wife. On the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings in Normandy, Artie decides to secretly escape his Northern Ireland care home, and embarks on a journey to France to pay his final respects to his best friend. Drama, starring Pierce Brosnan and Jurgen Prochnow.(n)

programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. Clarice is a vivacious young factory worker in the industrial British midlands of the 1920s. Bursting with ideas for colours and shapes, she takes more and more dangerous risks, but manages to stay one step ahead of the workhouse and impress eccentric factory owner Colley Shorter with her talent and innovation. Starring Phoebe Dynevor, Matthew Goode and David Morrissey.(n)

programme.title: To Olivia
programme.desc: In 1962, writer Roald Dahl and his movie star wife Patricia Neal have retreated to the English countryside to bring up their young family. Tragically, their lives are turned upside down by the death of their daughter, Olivia. As the couple struggle through the loss, their grief becomes a source of redemption and strength which changes their destiny. Drama, starring Hugh Bonneville, Keeley Hawes and in one of his final films, Geoffrey Palmer.(n)

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: A shy man struggling to cope with a recent break-up is horrified to learn his impulsive former girlfriend has had all recollection of their relationship erased from her mind. He gets even by having the same treatment, but during the procedure he relives their time together and falls for her again, leaving him determined to keep his memories. Michel Gondry's surreal romantic drama, with Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson and Elijah Wood.(n)

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death takes over the body of a recently deceased young man, and embarks on a mission to claim the life of a powerful media tycoon, but ends up falling in love with his daughter instead - leaving him on the horns of a dilemma. Remake of 1934 romantic fantasy Death Takes a Holiday, starring Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins and Claire Forlani.(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: A fresh-faced Marine's boot-camp training turns into a real tour of duty when he is sent to fight in the Gulf War in 1991. However, the desert action is not what the new recruit expected - the willing soldiers are forced to wait for hours in searing heat, while their day is punctuated by moments of terror. Drama, based on the autobiography by veteran Anthony Swofford, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Jamie Foxx, Peter Sarsgaard and Chris Cooper.(n)

programme.title: West North West
programme.desc: A romance develops between a Japanese bartender, an Iranian art student and a Japanese model. Drama, starring Hanae Kan and Sahel Rosa.(n)

programme.title: Parachute
programme.desc: Riley, a young woman recently released from rehab, meets Ethan and finds herself navigating the line between love and a new addiction. Director Brittany Snow's romantic comedy drama, starring Courtney Eaton, Thomas Mann and Dave Bautista.

programme.title: Miranda's Victim
programme.desc: Teenager Patricia 'Trish' Weir is committed to putting her kidnapper and rapist Ernesto Miranda in prison, while her life is wrecked by the legal system. Drama, starring Abigail Breslin, Emily VanCamp and Kyle MacLachlan.

programme.title: Goodbye Bafana
programme.desc: James Gregory, a prison guard in apartheid-era South Africa and lifelong believer in his society's racist ideology, is assigned to Robben Island prison to watch over its most famous inmate - Nelson Mandela. Over the years an unusual relationship develops between the two, leading Gregory to question his beliefs. Fact-based drama, starring Joseph Fiennes, Dennis Haysbert, Diane Kruger and Shiloh Henderson.

programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: Artie Crawford is a Second World War veteran who has just lost his wife. On the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings in Normandy, Artie decides to secretly escape his Northern Ireland care home, and embarks on a journey to France to pay his final respects to his best friend. Drama, starring Pierce Brosnan and Jurgen Prochnow.

programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. Clarice is a vivacious young factory worker in the industrial British midlands of the 1920s. Bursting with ideas for colours and shapes, she takes more and more dangerous risks, but manages to stay one step ahead of the workhouse and impress eccentric factory owner Colley Shorter with her talent and innovation. Starring Phoebe Dynevor, Matthew Goode and David Morrissey.

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's biopic of the technology entrepreneur, exploring his life through three pivotal moments over the course of 14 years. Jobs is passionately driven to revolutionise computing technology, but his dreams come at a price, with a devastating impact on both is relationship with his family and his own health. Starring Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet and Seth Rogen.

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: A fresh-faced Marine's boot-camp training turns into a real tour of duty when he is sent to fight in the Gulf War in 1991. However, the desert action is not what the new recruit expected - the willing soldiers are forced to wait for hours in searing heat, while their day is punctuated by moments of terror. Drama, based on the autobiography by veteran Anthony Swofford, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Jamie Foxx, Peter Sarsgaard and Chris Cooper.

programme.title: Dance First
programme.desc: In 1969 Stockholm, Samuel Beckett is due to receive the Nobel Prize for Literature at a ceremony attended by his wife Suzanne and dignitaries. As he ascends the stage to accept the honour, Beckett sparks a conversation with himself about events and people that have led him to this point. Drama, starring Gabriel Byrne and Aidan Gillen.

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: A middle-class family take in a hulking homeless teenager, who has no education or skills to speak of. The indomitable wife encourages him to turn his life around, helping him to get the grades he needs for a college scholarship and hone his sporting skills to become an American football player. Fact-based drama, starring an Oscar-winning Sandra Bullock alongside Quinton Aaron and Tim McGraw.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Biopic of hip-hop group NWA, examining their rise to fame in the 1980s. The five members of the group drew inspiration from their anger at the dangerous world they saw around them, producing hard-hitting songs about urban life that redefined a musical genre. Starring O'Shea Jackson Jr, Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell, Neil Brown Jr and Aldis Hodge.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: American fashion model-turned-war photographer Lee Miller is determined to document the truth of the Nazi regime, and in spite of the odds stacked against female correspondents, she captures some of the most important images of the Second World War. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Winslet, Andy Samberg, Alexander Skarsgard and Marion Cotillard.

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's biopic of the technology entrepreneur, exploring his life through three pivotal moments over the course of 14 years. Jobs is passionately driven to revolutionise computing technology, but his dreams come at a price, with a devastating impact on both is relationship with his family and his own health. Starring Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet and Seth Rogen.

programme.title: What Dreams May Come
programme.desc: The spirit of a man killed in a car crash uses his vivid imagination to create a breath-taking world - but he is unable to fully enjoy his heavenly home without his wife beside him. However, when grief drives her to suicide, she ends up in an altogether more hellish afterlife, prompting her husband to embark on a perilous mission to rescue her from the dark side. Fantasy, starring Robin Williams, Cuba Gooding Jr, Annabella Sciorra and Max von Sydow.

programme.title: The Young Messiah
programme.desc: Biblical drama telling the story of Jesus Christ at the age of seven as he and his family depart Egypt to return home to Nazareth and the youngster begins to discover the true extent of his gifts. Adam Greaves-Neal stars, with Sara Lazzaro, Christian McKay and Sean Bean.

programme.title: Girl You Know It's True
programme.desc: During the 1980s, dancers Rob Pilatus and Fabrice Morvan become pop stars as Milli Vanilli, but unknown to their fans, they are lip-syncing to other artists. Biographical drama, starring Elan Ben Ali, Tijan Njie and Matthias Schweighofer.

programme.title: Dance First
programme.desc: In 1969 Stockholm, Samuel Beckett is due to receive the Nobel Prize for Literature at a ceremony attended by his wife Suzanne and dignitaries. As he ascends the stage to accept the honour, Beckett sparks a conversation with himself about events and people that have led him to this point. Drama, starring Gabriel Byrne and Aidan Gillen.

programme.title: Der Kaiser
programme.desc: Biopic focusing on the life of German soccer player and manager Franz Beckenbauer, starring Klaus Steinbacher and Teresa Rizos. In German.

programme.title: Charming the Hearts of Men
programme.desc: A sophisticated woman returns to her Southern home town and discovers her options are limited yet discrimination is plentiful. With the help of a Congressional ally, she inspires historic legislation that allows opportunities and protections never before afforded to women. Historical romance, starring Kelsey Grammer, Anna Friel and Sean Astin.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Biopic of hip-hop group NWA, examining their rise to fame in the 1980s. The five members of the group drew inspiration from their anger at the dangerous world they saw around them, producing hard-hitting songs about urban life that redefined a musical genre. Starring O'Shea Jackson Jr, Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell, Neil Brown Jr and Aldis Hodge.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: A single mother desperate for work pleads her way into a routine administrative job at a law firm. It is not long before she stumbles across mislaid documents about a case brought against a corporation for poisoning the residents of a small town by contaminating their water supply. Realising something is amiss, she begins her own investigation. Fact-based drama, with Julia Roberts in an Oscar-winning role, alongside Albert Finney and Aaron Eckhart.

programme.desc: American fashion model-turned-war photographer Lee Miller is determined to document the truth of the Nazi regime, and in spite of the odds stacked against female correspondents, she captures some of the most important images of the Second World War. programme.title: Manodrome
programme.desc: Concerned about his girlfriend's pregnancy, Ralphie's life spirals when he meets a mysterious family. Writer/director John Trengove's thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Adrien Brody and Odessa Young.

programme.title: The Integrity Of Joseph Chambers
programme.desc: An insurance salesman, hoping to prove his survivalist skills to his family, irresponsibly goes hunting alone. But he isn't prepared for what lies ahead. Writer/director Robert Machoian's drama, starring Clayne Crawford and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: Charming the Hearts of Men
programme.desc: A sophisticated woman returns to her Southern home town and discovers her options are limited yet discrimination is plentiful. With the help of a Congressional ally, she inspires historic legislation that allows opportunities and protections never before afforded to women. Historical romance, starring Kelsey Grammer, Anna Friel and Sean Astin.

programme.title: Der Kaiser
programme.desc: Biopic focusing on the life of German soccer player and manager Franz Beckenbauer, starring Klaus Steinbacher and Teresa Rizos. In German.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich

Realising something is amiss, she begins her own investigation. Fact-based drama, with Julia Roberts in an Oscar-winning role, alongside Albert Finney and Aaron Eckhart.

programme.title: Goodbye Bafana
programme.desc: James Gregory, a prison guard in apartheid-era South Africa and lifelong believer in his society's racist ideology, is assigned to Robben Island prison to watch over its most famous inmate - Nelson Mandela. Over the years an unusual relationship develops between the two, leading Gregory to question his beliefs. Fact-based drama, starring Joseph Fiennes, Dennis Haysbert, Diane Kruger and Shiloh Henderson.

programme.title: Save the Cinema
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Liz Evans from Carmarthen, south-west Wales, who started a campaign in the 1990s to save the town's Lyric Cinema. With the help of local politician Richard Goodridge, Liz manages to persuade Steven Spielberg to show a premiere of Jurassic Park at the Lyric. Starring Samantha Morton, Tom Felton and Jonathan Pryce.

programme.title: A Sacrifice
programme.desc: US social psychologist Ben Monroe investigates a local cult connected to an unnerving event, while his daughter becomes mixed up with an enigmatic local boy. Co-writer/director Jordan Scott's drama, starring Eric Bana, Sylvia Hoeks and Sadie Sink (Stranger Things).

programme.title: The United States Vs. Billie Holiday
programme.desc: The acclaimed singer is targeted by the Federal Department of Narcotics with an undercover sting operation led by Federal Agent Jimmy Fletcher, with who she had a tumultuous affair. Director Lee Daniels' biopic based on the novel by Johann Hari, starring Andra Day, Trevante Rhodes and Natasha Lyonne.

programme.title: Manodrome
programme.desc: Concerned about his girlfriend's pregnancy, Ralphie's life spirals when he meets a mysterious family. Writer/director John Trengove's thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Adrien Brody and Odessa Young.

programme.title: The Integrity Of Joseph Chambers
programme.desc: An insurance salesman, hoping to prove his survivalist skills to his family, irresponsibly goes hunting alone. But he isn't prepared for what lies ahead. Writer/director Robert Machoian's drama, starring Clayne Crawford and Jordana Brewster.

programme.title: Jesus Revolution
programme.desc: During the 1970s, a commune of teenage hippies in Southern California paves the way for a national spiritual awakening. Drama based on a true story, starring Joel Courtney, Jonathan Roumie and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Whiplash
programme.desc: A talented young jazz drummer thinks all his dreams have come true when he lands a place at a prestigious music academy. However, the experience turns into a nightmare thanks to an uncompromising tutor, who will stop at nothing to make his students realise their potential - including physical and mental abuse. Drama, starring Miles Teller, Paul Reiser and an Oscar-winning JK Simmons.(n)

programme.title: Cicada
programme.desc: As they continue to recover from separate traumatic events, two young men gradually start to fall for each other. Drama, starring Matthew Fifer and Sheldon D Brown.(n)

programme.title: The United States Vs. Billie Holiday
programme.desc: The acclaimed singer is targeted by the Federal Department of Narcotics with an undercover sting operation led by Federal Agent Jimmy Fletcher, with who she had a tumultuous affair. Director Lee Daniels' biopic based on the novel by Johann Hari, starring Andra Day, Trevante Rhodes and Natasha Lyonne.(n)

Starring Samantha Morton, Tom Felton and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: A Sacrifice
programme.desc: US social psychologist Ben Monroe investigates a local cult connected to an unnerving event, while his daughter becomes mixed up with an enigmatic local boy. Co-writer/director Jordan Scott's drama, starring Eric Bana, Sylvia Hoeks and Sadie Sink (Stranger Things).(n)

programme.title: Mass
programme.desc: Years after an unspeakable tragedy tore their lives apart, two sets of grieving parents agree to talk privately about what happened, in an attempt to move forward. First-time director Fran Kranz' drama, starring Jason Isaacs, Martha Plimpton, Reed Birney and Ann Dowd.(n)

programme.title: The Hanging Sun
programme.desc: Fleeing from his ex-employer, John, a reluctant assassin, seeks refuge in an isolated village, where he is faced with events that test his conscience. Drama based on the Jo Nesbo novel, starring Alessandro Borghi, Jessica Brown Findlay, Peter Mullan and Charles Dance.(n)

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: In the summer of 1939, influential families in Nazi Germany send their daughters to a finishing school in an English seaside town to learn the language and be ambassadors for Hitler. A teacher sees what is coming and tries to raise the alarm, but the authorities believe he is the problem. Thriller, starring Judi Dench, James D'Arcy, Jim Broadbent and Eddie Izzard.(n)

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: The younger son of George V struggles to cope with an uncontrollable stammer, prompting his wife to enlist the aid of an eccentric Australian speech therapist. The support and friendship of the doctor prove invaluable when a crisis places the repressed prince on the throne, just as the outbreak of the Second World War leaves the country in need of a strong king. Oscar-winning fact-based drama, starring Colin Firth, Geoffrey Rush, Helena Bonham Carter and Guy Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Whiplash
programme.desc: A talented young jazz drummer thinks all his dreams have come true when he lands a place at a prestigious music academy. However, the experience turns into a nightmare thanks to an uncompromising tutor, who will stop at nothing to make his students realise their potential - including physical and mental abuse. Drama, starring Miles Teller, Paul Reiser and an Oscar-winning JK Simmons.(n)

programme.title: Cicada
programme.desc: As they continue to recover from separate traumatic events, two young men gradually start to fall for each other. Drama, starring Matthew Fifer and Sheldon D Brown.(n)

programme.title: Minyan
programme.desc: New York City during the 1980s, and a young gay Russian immigrant looks to escape the constraints of his community and find a world teeming with possibilities. Drama, starring Samuel H Levine and Ron Rifkin.(n)

programme.title: L'immensità
programme.desc: In 1970s Rome, a mother contends with her loveless and abusive marriage while caring for her children, one of who is experiencing gender dysphoria and wishes to identify as a boy. Family drama, starring Penélope Cruz, Vincenzo Amato and Luana Giuliani. In Italian.(n)

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: Returning home for his mother's funeral, Renn Wheeland forges new relationships and heals old ones as he faces his grief. Drama, starring Nick Jonas, David Arquette and Brittany Snow.(n)

programme.title: Noah's Ark
programme.desc: Tom and Vini are mice who stow away on Noah's ark. They must use their musical talents to enter a competition and help maintain peace among the animals. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Rodrigo Santoro and Marcelo Adnet.(n)

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. Family adventure, starring Zachary Levi, Lil Rel Howery, Zooey Deschanel and Benjamin Bottani.(n)

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: An ex-convict returns to his home town in north-west China, where he joins a patrol clearing the streets of dogs ahead of the 2008 Olympics. Before long, he bonds with one of the strays and the two lonely souls embark on a new journey together. Drama, starring Eddie Peng. In Mandarin.(n)

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.(n)

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1
programme.desc: Families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas during the 19th century. Meanwhile, a seasoned cowboy goes on the run with a prostitute and a young lad after killing a fellow gunman. Western, starring Kevin Costner, who also co-wrote and directed, with Sienna Miller and Sam Worthington.(n)

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. At first, the omnipresent artificial intelligence simplifies day-to-day life. However, AIA becomes dangerously protective of the clan. Writer/director Chris Weitz's sci-fi horror, starring John Cho, Katherine Waterston and Keith Carradine.(n)

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Estranged childhood friends Heather and Carla reunite for a cup of tea after not having spoken in many years. At their meeting, Heather presents an unexpected proposition that will change their lives forever. Director Guillem Morales' thriller, starring Naomie Harris and Natalie Dormer.(n)

The third instalment of director Ti West's acclaimed X film series, starring Mia Goth, Lily Collins, Giancarlo Esposito and Kevin Bacon.

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: Small business owner Hope Goldman performs facials to celebrity clientele and powerful businesswomen. She is poised to launch her own skincare line, but is in arrears with rent on her store at a shopping complex. A rival called Angel opens in close proximity and soon after, her email is hacked and tyres slashed. Hope is convinced that Angel is the culprit and enlists hired thug Armen and young beau Jordan to extinguish the competition. Director Austin Peters' thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks and Lewis Pullman.

programme.title: Sneaks
programme.desc: Ty is a designer trainer who lives a life of luxury and comfort. However, when a shady shoe collector steals his sister, Ty, is forced to venture out into the world, and onto the streets of New York, to rescue her. Animated comedy, with the voices of Anthony Mackie, Keith David and Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. Family adventure, starring Zachary Levi, Lil Rel Howery, Zooey Deschanel and Benjamin Bottani.(n)

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: Returning home for his mother's funeral, Renn Wheeland forges new relationships and heals old ones as he faces his grief. Drama, starring Nick Jonas, David Arquette and Brittany Snow.(n)

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Estranged childhood friends Heather and Carla reunite for a cup of tea after not having spoken in many years. At their meeting, Heather presents an unexpected proposition that will change their lives forever. Director Guillem Morales' thriller, starring Naomie Harris and Natalie Dormer.(n)

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1
programme.desc: Families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas during the 19th century. Meanwhile, a seasoned cowboy goes on the run with a prostitute and a young lad after killing a fellow gunman. Western, starring Kevin Costner, who also co-wrote and directed, with Sienna Miller and Sam Worthington.(n)

programme.title: Sneaks
programme.desc: Ty is a designer trainer who lives a life of luxury and comfort. However, when a shady shoe collector steals his sister, Ty, is forced to venture out into the world, and onto the streets of New York, to rescue her. Animated comedy, with the voices of Anthony Mackie, Keith David and Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.(n)

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Estranged childhood friends Heather and Carla reunite for a cup of tea after not having spoken in many years. At their meeting, Heather presents an unexpected proposition that will change their lives forever. Director Guillem Morales' thriller, starring Naomie Harris and Natalie Dormer.(n)

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. At first, the omnipresent artificial intelligence simplifies day-to-day life. However, AIA becomes dangerously protective of the clan. Writer/director Chris Weitz's sci-fi horror, starring John Cho, Katherine Waterston and Keith Carradine.(n)

programme.title: Blood For Dust
programme.desc: A travelling salesman drowning under the weight of providing for his family finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague. Action thriller, starring Scoot McNairy, Kit Harington, Josh Lucas and Ethan Suplee.(n)

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: An ex-convict returns to his home town in north-west China, where he joins a patrol clearing the streets of dogs ahead of the 2008 Olympics. Before long, he bonds with one of the strays and the two lonely souls embark on a new journey together. Drama, starring Eddie Peng. In Mandarin.(n)

programme.title: The Cinema List: Women Oscar Winners
programme.desc: Highlighting female Oscar winners across the categories, from iconic leading ladies to women trailblazing behind the scenes.(n)

programme.desc: Campus cops make a terrible discovery in a dorm room after a boyfriend's weekend visit goes horribly wrong.(n)

programme.desc: Science-fiction comedy starring Will Smith and Josh Brolin. The fight against aliens is taken to a new dimension when Agent J is forced to travel back to 1969 in an effort to prevent his partner's murder by ruthless fugitive Boris the Animal.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Aboard the International Space Station, tensions flare between the US and Russian astronauts after a nuclear war breaks out on Earth. Sci-fi space thriller, starring Ariana DeBose, Chris Messina and John Gallagher Jr.

programme.desc: In the Stone Age, a gang of early humans face a mystical being hellbent on hunting them down. Prehistoric horror, starring Iola Evans and Arno LÃ¼ning. The dialogue is in a specially contructed language and features subtitles.

programme.desc: A Navy SEAL squad leader escorts a suspected terrorist from a black site when they come under fire from a group of mercenaries. Director James Nunn's thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Alexis Knapp and Tom Berenger.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Biopic
programme.desc: When life inspires film, the most incredible stories are told. Join us as we journey through some of our favourite biopics, from Sky Original film Lee to Goodfellas and Back to Black.

programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Justice Smith and David Alan Grier. Genial artist Aren, who is African-American, is struggling to make sense of his place in the world until he's invited to join a secret society dedicated to enhancing the lives of white people. However, Aren's debut mission tests his loyalty when he and his first assignment fall for the same person.

programme.title: I.S.S.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure directed by Steven Spielberg, starring Mark Rylance and Ruby Barnhill. programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure based on the books by Holly Black and Tony DiTerlizzi, starring Freddie Highmore and Sarah Bolger. When twins Jared and Simon Grace and their sister Mallory move into their aunt's dilapidated house in the country, they are drawn into a magical world that reveals the strange history of the property and of their family.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: An ancient relic of alien biotechnology known as the Scarab chooses college graduate Jaime Reyes as its symbiotic host. He is transformed into the superhero Blue Beetle, who is protected by a suit of armour. However, powerful businesswoman Victoria Kord will stop at nothing to acquire the Scarab. Fantasy adventure based on the DC Comics creation, starring Xolo MaridueÃ±a and Bruna Marquezine.

programme.title: Insidious: The Red Door
programme.desc: Ten years have passed since Josh Lambert and son Dalton escaped from The Further and reunited with Renai. Dalton is preparing to leave home for an Ivy League university, until demons from the past resurface with a vengeance and threaten to destroy Dalton and everyone around him. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson and Ty Simpkins.

programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Musical adaptation of Alice Walker's novel, starring Fantasia Barrino and Taraji P Henson. In early 20th-century Georgia, young Celie is forced to marry the tyrannical farmer "Mister". For years, Celie's life is bleak and difficult, but when Mister's mistress, the spirited jazz singer Shug Avery, comes to stay, Celie begins to believe in herself.

programme.title: One More Shot
programme.desc: A Navy SEAL squad leader escorts a suspected terrorist from a black site when they come under fire from a group of mercenaries. Director James Nunn's thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Alexis Knapp and Tom Berenger.

programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: Residents of a small Pennsylvania town are disturbed when a UFO crashes into a back garden. Director Marc Turtletaub's comedy drama, starring Ben Kingsley, Harriet Harris and Jane Curtin.
